name: Epic Fly
storyline:
Help the toy plane to get home.
Tap the screen to fly through the forest. 
Avoid obstacles from your path. 
Collect the points to achieve high score.
summary:
Welcome to a magical world. A beautiful and peaceful world. Get out of stress. Just play and relax.

Instructions:
Help the toy plane to get home.
Tap the screen to fly through the forest. 
Avoid obstacles from your path. 
Collect the points to achieve high score.
Succes.

Description:
Beautiful landscapes. Relaxing sounds. Nature and forests. Amazing graphics. Nice story.
Nature lover? Or you want to escape from crowded city? This is the way. The best relaxing game.
